articles.title: NBA to reopen facilities this week in states relaxing stay-at-home orders, according to report
articles.description: The NBA plans to reopen team practice facilities Friday in areas where local governments have relaxed stay-at-home restrictions amid the coronavirus pandemic, according to an ESPN report.

articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: Why a flood of bad economic data isn't rattling stocks
articles.description: Investors are getting pummeled with grim economic data from March and April. Although it doesn't look pretty, stocks are largely standing their ground.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Biden's invisible campaign is winning
articles.description: From March 20th to April 20th, Trump's gotten about 90% of the coverage dedicated to Biden or him. You would think that this would be a disaster for Biden. It's not happening. The swing state polling suggests that Biden's is in an improved position.
